revised_title: Observations on the Anatomy of the Thyroid Body in Man: Development and Connections
tldr: The author examines the development and connections of the thyroid gland in human embryos, analyzing its anatomy and relations with the trachea and larynx. The study provides insights into the thyroid's early development and its distinctness from the thymus, as well as the variations in its structure during fetal life.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
